title: NEWLY REDESIGNED PREMIER
long_description:
Newly Redesigned Premier View 

Premier View rooms are up to 256 sq ft and include a Queen or King bed with Simmons pillowtop mattress. With views of the city skyline or bay, these rooms offer that special Nob Hill experience! 

Premier View Two Doubles are up to 270 sq ft and include views of the city skyline. 

Newly Redesigned Premier Interior 

Premier Interior rooms are up to 270 sq ft. Spacious rooms with two Queen beds, located on the interior side. Overlooking our courtyard, these interior rooms offer a peaceful retreat.

Premeir View & Interior rooms features superfast Wifi, 49” high-definition television with HDMI and USB Ports, USB outlets and a mini-refrigerator.
